document.full_text: a top commander of the revolutionary armed forces of colombia, guillermo torres, was captured in venezuela, which has for years been a refuge for colombia's leftist insurgents.
document.title: the americas: colombia: farc commander is captured in venezuela
lines_and_colors: a top commander of the revolutionary armed forces of colombia, guillermo torres, was captured in venezuela, which has for years been a refuge for colombia's leftist insurgents.
